template.name: Master/Detail Flow
template.description: Creates a new master/detail flow, allowing users to view a collection of objects as well as details for each object. This flow is presented using two columns on tablet-size screens and one column on handsets and smaller screens. This template creates two activities, a master fragment, and a detail fragment.

parameter.name: Launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, the primary activity in the flow will have a CATEGORY_LAUNCHER intent filter, making it visible in the launcher
